name: minio
tagline: A high performance object storage server compatible with S3
description: MinIO is a high-performance, self-hosted object storage solution compatible with the S3 API. It's ideal for cloud-native apps, providing scalable, distributed storage with client libraries and a web UI.

features.title: S3 Compatible
features.description: Fully compatible with Amazon S3 API for seamless integration with existing tools

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Optimized for speed with multi-threaded operations and efficient data handling

features.title: Load Balancing
features.description: Scale horizontally across multiple servers for unlimited storage capacity

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Built-in encryption, access policies, and compliance with security standards

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run on your own infrastructure with complete data sovereignty

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Modern web interface for managing buckets, objects, and configurations

features.title: REST API
features.description: Client libraries for Python, Java, Go, JavaScript, and more

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Advanced data protection with configurable redundancy levels
